[`sagemaker`](https://github.com/tmastny/sagemaker) R Interface

[`sagemaker-tidymodels`](https://github.com/tmastny/sagemaker-tidymodels): 
framework for [tidymodels](https://www.tidymodels.org/)
 

<!--more-->

The [`sagemaker`](https://github.com/tmastny/sagemaker) R package
provides a simplified interface to the [AWS Sagemaker](https://aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/)
API. See the [documentation](https://tmastny.github.io/sagemaker/index.html)
to get started.

[`sagemaker-tidymodels`](https://github.com/tmastny/sagemaker-tidymodels) is
a Python package and Docker container that creates an AWS Sagemaker framework
for training and deploying machine learning models created by
[tidymodels](https://www.tidymodels.org/)
in the cloud.
